item.title: Need Help Creating an Awesome Owner Spell
item.dc:creator: @Nirvana.Marijuana Nirvana.Marijuana
item.description:
@Nirvana.Marijuana wrote:

[size=20pt]CURRENT THING I NEED HELP WITH:[/size]
(HELPING ME CAN EARN MODSHIP!!!)

I need someone to help me made a spell casted with a wistle item #16
I want this for the gfx of the spell but i want it to cast like oblaks holy force spell

This is the Gfx:

stillgfx(287, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); // 287 = HUGE Explosion stillgfx(287, castOnPlayer.absY+3, castOnPlayer.absX); stillgfx(287, castOnPlayer.absY-3, castOnPlayer.absX); stillgfx(287, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX+3); stillgfx(287, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX-3); stillgfx(287, castOnPlayer.absY+2, castOnPlayer.absX-2); stillgfx(287, castOnPlayer.absY-2, castOnPlayer.absX+2); stillgfx(287, castOnPlayer.absY+2, castOnPlayer.absX+2); stillgfx(287, castOnPlayer.absY-2, castOnPlayer.absX-2);

And this is code for Oblaks spell:

if(playerRights >= 2) { attackPlayersWithin(451, 4000, 100); attackPlayersWithin(444, 4000, 100); attackPlayersWithin(341, 4000, 100); attackPlayersWithin(76, 4000, 100); sendMessage("You Desimate All Planetary Life Around You..."); } else { sendMessage("You aren't a mod!?!? What r u doing with this item?!"); } break;

So far I have this:

case 16: //whistle if(playerRights >= 2) { attackPlayersWithin(451, 40, 5); attackPlayersWithin(444, 40, 5); attackPlayersWithin(341, 40, 5); attackPlayersWithin(76, 40, 5); attackPlayersWithin(287, 40, 5); // 287 = HUGE Explosion attackPlayersWithin(287, 40, 5); attackPlayersWithin(287, 40, 5); attackPlayersWithin(287, 40, 5); attackPlayersWithin(287, 40, 5); attackPlayersWithin(287, 40, 5); attackPlayersWithin(287, 40, 5); attackPlayersWithin(287, 40, 5); attackPlayersWithin(287, 40, 5); } else { sendMessage("You need to be an admin to use this!"); } break;

And I get this error:

client.java:15663: unreachable statement int item_id = inStream.readSignedWordA(); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .
THANKS!!!

People who have condributed enough for modship list:
-r1ch kid

NiRvAnA.MaRiJuAnA@HoTmAiL.cOm
~NiRvAnA~

Read full topic
